function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High R t leading to uncontrolled epidemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relaxation of control measures leading to risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited testing capacity leading to underestimation of true infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited data
